column4: hello, i need help here, could anyone please help me...thank you.
I don't have experience with google earth, and plus you aren't specific, there's two drivers for ati
ic, i am using ati x200m driver ... is there anyway to make it stop blinking bcos it makes me cannot see the earth.

well that isn't a driver, afaik by default you might be using the radeon driver, if you went through hardware drivers and enabled restricted driver named fglrx, you should get better performance out of your ati chipset but I'd research first before enabling fglrx (if available as option)
